SEARCH
Module clientCLI
Package com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.controllers

Class AuthenticationController

java.lang.Object
com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.controllers.AuthenticationController
public class AuthenticationController extends Object
The AuthenticationController class manages user authentication and account creation within the UniShop CLI application. It collaborates with the ViewRenderer and AuthenticationModel to handle login, account creation, and related actions.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final AuthenticationModel
    authModel
    The AuthenticationModel responsible for handling authentication and account creation.
    private final ViewRenderer

    The ViewRenderer responsible for rendering views.

    • loginBuyer

      public OperationResult loginBuyer(String username, String password)
      Attempts to authenticate a buyer with the provided username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the buyer.
      password - The password of the buyer.
      Returns:
      The result of the authentication operation.

    • loginSeller

      public OperationResult loginSeller(String name, String password)
      Attempts to authenticate a seller with the provided name and password.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the seller.
      password - The password of the seller.
      Returns:
      The result of the authentication operation.

    • isCorrectPassword

      public boolean isCorrectPassword(UUID userId, String password)
      Checks if the provided password is correct for the specified user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The UUID of the user.
      password - The password to check.
      Returns:
      true if the password is correct, false otherwise.

    • createNewBuyer

      public OperationResult createNewBuyer(String username, String password, String firstName, String lastName, String email, String phoneNumber, String address)
      Creates a new buyer account with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the new buyer.
      password - The password of the new buyer.
      firstName - The first name of the new buyer.
      lastName - The last name of the new buyer.
      email - The email of the new buyer.
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the new buyer.
      address - The address of the new buyer.
      Returns:
      The result of the account creation operation.

    • createNewSeller

      public OperationResult createNewSeller(String name, String password, String email, String phoneNumber, String address)
      Creates a new seller account with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the new seller.
      password - The password of the new seller.
      email - The email of the new seller.
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the new seller.
      address - The address of the new seller.
      Returns:
      The result of the account creation operation.

    • quitApplication

      public void quitApplication()
      Quits the application by invoking the quit method from the Utils class and clears the view history in the renderer.
